website_summaries.verdict: Have a walking-on-cloud experience with the lightweight low-top Nike Viale Tech Racer. It also provides nice cushioning for all-day comfort and impact protection. With its mesh upper, foot breathability is expected. Without sacrificing comfort, the Nike VTR has a versatile silhouette that can make an on-trend statement. With an affordable price, this kick can surely complement several dress-up and -down outfits.
pros: A significant number of customers have applauded the straightforward yet eye-catching style of the Nike Viale Tech Racer
This sneaker offers a comfortable fit, according to many who have shared their on-feet reviews
Plenty of users have attested that they feel like walking on clouds when they wear this kind of Nike shoes because it is so lightweight
The low-top Nike VTR is a durable sneaker, according to some testers
Several wearers say that the Viale Tech Racer by Nike has a versatile design that can match several outfits
This iteration of the Nike Viale is available in different beautiful colorways that are lauded by some reviewers
A couple of users say that it has a roomy toe area
The Nike Viale Tech Racer provides good arch support for walking, as per a couple of testers
A few have mentioned that it provides sufficient stability
cons: The Nike Viale Tech Racer has a narrow fit in the heel area
Wearing socks is recommended by a couple of reviewers
It has a stiff sole, according to one

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: the sole is light not heavy. the shoe fits snug and flexible.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard, no cushioning or support inside!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look great, but are ROCK hard. They would be awful for actually running. I bought them for better support at work because my current shoes are pretty hard, and these were WORSE. The liner is maybe a millimeter thick and underneath has absolutely no cushioning. If you're buying them to look cute, then they're fine. If you actually need support and function, then keep looking!
customer_reviews.author: R. Vidal

customer_reviews.title: These are so nice!
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are nice and comfortable. I adore the subtleness of the colors in the style. Comfort level is an 8 out of 10.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Way off-size
customer_reviews.text: These are adorable shoes but they run so big I feel like a clown in them!
customer_reviews.author: Renée

customer_reviews.title: These are so cute!
customer_reviews.text: Just received and try them on, they’re perfect in size , usually a size 6 or 61/2 depending on brand. But read the reviews and de ided to order 61/2 figured if they were a tad bigger no problem. They fit perfectly, gorgeous color ! I will come back to update review once i have wore them a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and Functional
customer_reviews.text: These are great for workouts and look great for anytime I want a red shoe. Which is typically on tuesdays.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: Wish there was a sixth star!
customer_reviews.text: My sweetie LOVES these shoes. Sooo comfortable due to the stretchy material and cushy insole. Look fabulous. Our daughter so like them we purchased a pair for her and she is over the moon about hers, too!
customer_reviews.author: Little Voice

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: I had my eye on this pair on the Nike site. When I saw them for this price, had to order. Red is my son’s school colors. Wore them to a couple Friday night games.
customer_reviews.author: Pittsburgh Steelers fan

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and as pictured
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I see is that they don't have rubber soles. Not sure why shoe makers are taking the rubber away but besides that they are nice.
customer_reviews.author: JAZ

customer_reviews.title: Runs 1/2 size small
customer_reviews.text: Size is not a true 9. I am returning these.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Connors

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Came in a timely manner . Fits well. Very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Sharay Alexander

customer_reviews.title: lightweight, reasonable price, with an amazing style and color!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing shoes and price!! Was a bit nervous to order these but was so worth it! Lightweight, comfy and true to size. I ordered the bright red, perfect gift!
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra Risenhoover

customer_reviews.title: Carry band-aids the first day
customer_reviews.text: Bought the sneaker to wear at work. Looks nice true to size. Left with band-aid on back of food due to hard heel rubbing from the matwrial.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Sneakers fit true to size and they are very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Shoe!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoe. Fits perfectly, feels great and it looks so good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product and for the price and quality great shoe
customer_reviews.author: Erick Arzberger

customer_reviews.title: Love this shoe!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Very stylish. I have received lots of compliments while wearing shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Lampkin

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable! I am so glad I decided to order this pair for my workouts
customer_reviews.author: Mandy Gray

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Very bright red and a good fit but poor cushion in the bed of the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer fuller

customer_reviews.title: No Box?
customer_reviews.text: These are nice to look at. Not sure how long they will hold up. Also questioning the authenticity of the shoes because they didn’t come in a shoe box but just in a plastic bag. They were squished from shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Celena

customer_reviews.title: Birthday shoes
customer_reviews.text: This was a birthday gift for my wife, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge Armendariz

product_meta.title: Nike Women's VTR Sneaker
product_meta.description: The vtr brings modern design With a bold swoosh to offer updated style and comfort.
